# Montana State University

<!-- wss -->

<a href="projects/msu/wss.qmd" style="text-decoration:none;"> [Master's Project]{style="font-size:2em;"} </a> [*wheat stem sawfly and native parasitoids*]{style="fonts-size:1em;"}\

::: box
Understanding the ecological importance of smooth brome (*Bromus inermis*) in biological control of the wheat stem sawfly (*Cephus cinctus*) using native parasitoids. <br>\
*PI: [Dr. David Weaver](https://landresources.montana.edu/directory/faculty/1524725/david-weaver){style="text-decoration:none;"}*
:::

<br> 
<!-- locoweed --> 
<a href="projects/msu/locoweed.qmd" style="text-decoration:none;"> [Locoweed Volatiles]{style="font-size:2em;"} </a> [*volatile profile differences in Oxytropis sericea*]{style="fonts-size:1em;"}\

::: box
Measuring the differences in volatile organic compound (VOC) profiles between *Oxytropis sericea* specimens containing the commensal endophyte *Alternaira oxytropos*, and those without.\
<br> *PI: [Dr. Tracy Sterling](http://weedeco.msu.montana.edu/faculty/tracy_sterling/){style="text-decoration:none;"}*
:::

<br> 
<!-- toadflax --> 
<a href="projects/msu/toadflax.qmd" style="text-decoration:none;"> [Toadflax]{style="font-size:2em;"} </a> [*VOC data analysis*]{style="fonts-size:1em;"}\

::: box
Analyzing the difference in VOC profiles between two toadflax species and hybrids. Project in joint with the US Forest Service. <br>\
*PI: [Dr. David Weaver](https://landresources.montana.edu/directory/faculty/1524725/david-weaver){style="text-decoration: none;"} & [Dr. Sharlene Sing (USFS)](https://www.fs.usda.gov/research/about/people/ssing){style="text-decoration:none;"}*
:::

# Other

<a href="projects/gso.qmd" style="text-decoration:none;"> [LRES Graduate Student Organization]{style="font-size:2em;"} </a> \

::: box
Served as the treasurer from 2022-2023, then as co-chair from 2023-2024. Built and managed HTML emails, a website, and organized a research symposium.
:::

<br>

<a href="projects/bballtool.qmd" style="text-decoration:none;"> [NBA Roster Analysis Tool]{style="font-size:2em;"} </a> [basketball roster analysis]{style="fonts-size:1em;"}\

::: box
From 2017 to 2019, I built my own NBA roster analysis tool for analyzing roster construction, free agency, and per-game metrics. The information is out of date, but all of the functionality still works.
:::
